verses.verse: You shall observe<WH8104> to do<WH6213> all the commandment<WH4687> which I command<WH6680> you this day,<WH3117> that you may live,<WH2421> and multiply,<WH7235> and go in<WH935> and possess<WH3423> the land<WH776> which Yahweh<WH3068> swore<WH7650> to your fathers.<WH1>

You shall remember<WH2142> all the way<WH1870> which Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> has led<WH3212> you these forty<WH705> years<WH8141> in the wilderness,<WH4057> that he might humble<WH6031> you,<WH5254> to prove you,<WH3045> to know what was in your heart,<WH3824> whether you would keep<WH8104> his commandments,<WH4687> or not.

He humbled<WH6031> you,<WH7456> and allowed you to be hungry, and fed<WH398> you with manna,<WH4478> which you didn't<WH3045> know, neither did your fathers<WH1> know;<WH3045> that he might make you know<WH3045> that man<WH120> does not live<WH2421> by bread<WH3899> only,<WH905> but man<WH120> lives<WH2421> by everything that proceeds<WH4161> out of the mouth<WH6310> of Yahweh.<WH3068>
Your clothing<WH8071> didn't<WH1086> grow old on you,<WH7272> neither did your foot swell,<WH1216> these forty<WH705> years.<WH8141>
You shall consider<WH3045> in<WH5973> your heart<WH3824> that as a man<WH376> chastens<WH3256> his son,<WH1121> so Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> chastens you.<WH3256>
You shall keep<WH8104> the commandments<WH4687> of Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> to walk<WH3212> in his ways,<WH1870> and to fear him.<WH3372>

For Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> brings<WH935> you into a good<WH2896> land,<WH776> a land<WH776> of brooks<WH5158> of water,<WH4325> of springs,<WH5869> and underground<WH8415> water<WH4325> flowing into valleys<WH1237> and hills;<WH2022>
a land<WH776> of wheat<WH2406> and barley,<WH8184> and vines<WH1612> and fig trees<WH8384> and pomegranates;<WH7416> a land<WH776> of olive<WH2132> trees<WH8081> and honey;<WH1706>

a land<WH776> in which<WH834> you shall eat<WH398> bread<WH3899> without<WH3808> scarceness,<WH4544> you shall not lack<WH2637> anything in it;<WH776> a land whose stones<WH68> are iron,<WH1270> and out of whose hills<WH2042> you may dig<WH2672> copper.<WH5178>
You shall eat<WH398> and be full,<WH7646> and you shall bless<WH1288> Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> for the good<WH2896> land<WH776> which he has given you.<WH5414>

Beware<WH8104> lest you forget<WH7911> Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> in not keeping<WH8104> his commandments,<WH4687> and his ordinances,<WH4941> and his statutes,<WH2708> which I command<WH6680> you this day:<WH3117>
lest,<WH398> when you have eaten and are full,<WH7646> and have built<WH1129> goodly<WH2896> houses,<WH1004> and lived therein;<WH3427>
and when your herds<WH1241> and your flocks<WH6629> multiply,<WH7235> and your silver<WH3701> and your gold<WH2091> is multiplied,<WH7235> and all that you have is multiplied;<WH7235>

then your heart<WH3824> be lifted up,<WH7311> and you forget<WH7911> Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> who brought you forth<WH3318> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> out of the house<WH1004> of bondage;<WH5650>

who led<WH3212> you through the great<WH1419> and terrible<WH3372> wilderness,<WH4057> with fiery<WH8314> serpents<WH5175> and scorpions,<WH6137> and thirsty<WH6774> ground where there was no water;<WH4325> who brought you forth<WH3318> water<WH4325> out of the rock<WH6697> of flint;<WH2496>

who fed<WH398> you in the wilderness<WH4057> with manna,<WH4478> which your fathers<WH1> didn't<WH3045> know; that he might humble<WH6031> you,<WH5254> and that he might prove you,<WH3190> to do you good at your latter end:<WH319>
and lest you say<WH559> in your heart,<WH3824> "My power<WH3581> and the might<WH6108> of my hand<WH3027> has gotten<WH6213> me this wealth.<WH2428>"

But you shall remember<WH2142> Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> for it is he who gives<WH5414> you power<WH3581> to get<WH6213> wealth;<WH2428> that he may establish<WH6965> his covenant<WH1285> which he swore<WH7650> to your fathers,<WH1> as at this day.<WH3117>

It shall be,<WH7911> if you shall forget<WH7911> Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> and walk<WH1980> after<WH310> other<WH312> gods,<WH430> and serve<WH5647> them,<WH7812> and worship them,<WH5749> I testify against you this day<WH3117> that you shall surely<WH6> perish.<WH6>

As the nations<WH1471> that Yahweh<WH3068> makes to perish<WH6> before you,<WH6440> so you shall perish;<WH6> because<WH6118> you wouldn't<WH8085> listen to the voice<WH6963> of Yahweh<WH3068> your God.<WH430>
